html.display_name: Activity: Create your own Google Earth tour. Wor...

font.span: Activity: Create your own Google Earth tour. Work with a partner to research some more wonders of engineering. Choose a topic, maybe "Engineering Wonders of the Ancient World" or "Engineering Wonders of the 21st Century". With your partner, create a Google Earth presentation sharing 3-5 wonders of engineering. When you are finished, upload the KMZ file below.
